DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess fusion status patient underwent spinal fusion Actifuse synthetic bone graft versus bone graft material ( include autograft ) achieve lumbar spinal fusion .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study Actifuse Synthetic Bone Graft Versus Other Bone Graft Substitutes Patients Requiring Lumbar Fusion
DOC.criteria: Any patient 18 year age old Patients minimum follow 1 year Patients previously undergone TLIF , PLIF , PLF , XLIF procedures Patients age 18 Any patient le 1 year follow history time first data analysis Any patient primary investigator deem unfit candidate
